title: Jungler looking for dynamic queue partners/potentially form a team to play regularly
body:
Hi, Im currently gold 3, and have had accounts as high as plat 4 before. I used to main toplane, and have recently switched to jungle. 

I have been a regular follower of competitive play since season 2, and am keen to play the game on a higher level than soloqueue has to offer. 

I am therefore recruiting an ADC, SUP (or botlane premade), and a mid/toplaner to grind dynamic queue together. 

Must have a deep champion-pool in your chosen role, and a good understanding of matchups and macro play. 

Add 'Yodel' ingame.
